column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This is my second place I tried for a Chicago deep dish pizza.  I had it delivered.  It was a Friday night and they told me deliver would be over an hour but was pleasantly surprised when it arrived in 50 minutes.  Furthermore
column2: the pizza was delivered hot and intact.  Kudos to the delivery folks.  I had the sausage pizza with the buttermilk crust with black olives added.  I thought the crust was decent.  I also thought the sauce and toppings were good.  Overall I thought the quality was good and I would go back.
